concept.title: Reusable phrases for the book
concept.shortdesc: Use the following reusable phrases for conrefs in the book:

conbody.p: Full, init cap version of the product name: Data Collector

p.draft-comment: Do we need a plural generic version?

conbody.p: The following bullets are used in "Previewing a Single Stage" and "Troubleshooting":

ul.li: The output data column for an origin stage.
The input data column for all other stages.

conbody.p:
The following bullets are the types of origins that can be reset / that remember where you left off. These are used currently in Starting a Pipeline and Resetting an Origin:
File Reader
Kafka Consumerany more?
